message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.CE, cs.SE 

The paper proposes a novel reinforcement learning based methodology for optimizing hot water production in buildings. This methodology is completely generalizable and does not require a detailed dynamics model for the hot water system or human domain knowledge. The paper also mentions the use of sensor data, which suggests a focus on machine learning and control systems. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.SY (Systems and Control), cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science), and cs.SE (Software Engineering).
